Introduction
This topic contains general information on discontinuation of the A&A allowance when a Veteran is hospitalized, including
regulatory requirements of 38 CFR 3.552
recovery of the cost of care
screening centrally automated reports
providing due process before adjusting benefits
actions to take after the due process period expires
, and
determining the rate payable during hospitalization
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C  - Adjusting Awards Involving an Aid and Attendance (A&A) Allowance
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section C
